gurmukhi: sur mwr murwr jbY As isau iqh pRwn qbY jmloku pTwey ]bwn kmwn kiRpwnn so kib sXwm khY Aiq ju`Du mcwey ]
transliteration: Sur Maar Muraar Jabai As Sio Tih Praan Tabai Jamlok(u) Pathaae|| Baan Kamaan Kridaanan So Kabi Syaam Kahai At(i) Juddh(u) Machaae||

gurmukhi: Qo su kutMb ijqo iqh ko su sunXo iqh XO mur sXwmih Gwey ]lY kY AnI cqurMg GnI hir pY iqh ky suq swq hI Dwey ]2126]
transliteration: Tho Su Koutanb Jito Tih Ko Su Sounyo Tih Yau Mur Syaamaah(i) Ghaae|| Lai Kai Anichaturan Ghanidar(i) Pai Tih Ke Sout Saat Hidhaae||2126||

gurmukhi: Gor dso ids qy hir ko iqh sXwm BnY qwik bwn pHwry ]eyk gdw gih hwQn bIc iBry mn ko Pun qRws invwry ]
transliteration: Gher Daso Dis Te Har(i) Ko Tih Syaam Bhanai Taak(i) Baan Prahdare|| Ek Gadaa Gadh Haathan Beech Bhire Man Ko Phujn Traas Nivdare||

gurmukhi: so sB AwXuD sXwm shwr kY jo Apny irs SsqR sMBwry ]sUr n kwhU ko Corq BXo sB hI purjy purjy kir fwry ]2127]
transliteration: So Sabh Aayudh Syaam Shaar Kai Jo Apone Ris Shastra Sanbhdare|| Soor Na Kaahoo Ko Chhodhat Bhyo Sabbh Hipurje Purje Kar(i) Ddare||2127||

gurmukhi: sYn inhwr hnI ApnI sun swqo aU BRwqr kRoD Bry ]Gin sXwm jU pY kib sXwm BnY sB SsqRn lY iklkwr pry ]
transliteration: Sain Nihaar Apnisoun Saato Oo Bhraatar Krodh Bhare|| Ghan(i) Syaam Joo Pai Kabi Syaam Bhanai Sabh Shastran Lai Kilkaar Dare||

gurmukhi: chUM Er qy Gyrq By hir ko Apny mn mY n rqI ku fry ]qb lau jb lau jdubIr srwsn lY nhI KMfn KMf kry ]2128]
transliteration: Chahoon Or Te Gherat Bhe Har(i) Ko Apne Man Mai Na Ratiku Dare|| Tab Lau Jab Lau Jadoubeer Saraasan Lai Nahikhanndan Khannddare||2128||

gurmukhi: qb kr swirMg sXwm lY Aiq iciq kRop bFwie ]pIt SqR B`Xn sihq jm pur dXo pTwie ]2129]
transliteration: Tab Kar Saaring Syaam Lai At(i) Chit(i) Krodh Badhaae|| Peet Shatra Bhayyan Sahit Jam Pur Dayo Pathaae||2129||

gurmukhi: BUA bwlk qo ieh BwNq sunXo mur bIr supuqR KpwXo ]Aaur ijqo dlu gXo iqn ky su soaU iCn mY jmlok pTwXo ]
transliteration: Bhooa Baalk To Eh Bhaant Sounyo Mur Beer Soupoutra Muraar Khapaayo|| Aur Jito Dal(u) Gyo Tin Ke Su Sooo Chhin Mai Jamlok Pathaayo||

gurmukhi: sMg ju`J kI lwiek hau hI hau XO kih kY icq kRoD bFwXo ]sYn bulwie sBY ApnI jdubIr so kwrn ju`D ko DwXo ]2130]
transliteration: San Jujjh Kilaaik Hau Hihau You Kah(i) Kai Chit Krodh Badhaayo|| Sain Bulaai Sabhai Apnijadoubeer So Kaaran Juddh Ko Dhaayo||2130||

gurmukhi: jb BUm ko bwrk ju`D ky kwj cVXo qb kauc su sUrn gwjy ]AwXuD Aaur sMBwr sBY Air Gyir lXo biRjnwiek swjy ]
transliteration: Jab Bhoom Ko Baarak Juddh Ke Kaaj Chadyo Tab Kaouch Su Sooran Gadje|| Ooyudh Aur Sanbhaar Sabhai Ar(i) Gher(i) Layo Brijnaaik Saaje||

gurmukhi: mwnhu kwl pRlY idn ko pRgtXo Gn hI ieh BwNiq ibrwjy ]mwnhu AMqk ky pur mY Btvwnih bwjq hY jnu bwjy ]2131]
transliteration: Maanoh Kaal Pralai Din Ko Pragtyo Ghan Hieh Bhaant(i) Biraaje|| Maanoh Antak Ke Pur Mai Bhatvaanah(i) Baajat Hai Jan(u) Baaje||2131||
